{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX2700 |revision= |asin=B00L0YLRUW;US; |est_release_date=07/2014 |fcc_date=06/27/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY314200263 |ic_id=4054A-14200263 |pcb_id=29764623 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N300 WiFi Range Extender - Essentials Edition}} :[http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX2700.aspx Product page]
The FCC docs seem to indicate this device is [[MediaTek|'''MTK''']] based.
